argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_fnun | |- ( ( ( F Fn A /\ G Fn B ) /\ ( A i^i B ) = (/) ) -> ( F u. G ) Fn ( A u. B ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_expcom | |- ( ( A i^i B ) = (/) -> ( ( F Fn A /\ G Fn B ) -> ( F u. G ) Fn ( A u. B ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_rnun | |- ran ( F u. G ) = ( ran F u. ran G ) |
| 4 |  | #P_unss12 | |- ( ( ran F C_ C /\ ran G C_ D ) -> ( ran F u. ran G ) C_ ( C u. D ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl5eqss | |- ( ( ran F C_ C /\ ran G C_ D ) -> ran ( F u. G ) C_ ( C u. D ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( A i^i B ) = (/) -> ( ( ran F C_ C /\ ran G C_ D ) -> ran ( F u. G ) C_ ( C u. D ) ) ) |
| 7 | 2, 6 | #P_anim12d | |- ( ( A i^i B ) = (/) -> ( ( ( F Fn A /\ G Fn B ) /\ ( ran F C_ C /\ ran G C_ D ) ) -> ( ( F u. G ) Fn ( A u. B ) /\ ran ( F u. G ) C_ ( C u. D ) ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_df-f | |- ( F : A --> C <-> ( F Fn A /\ ran F C_ C ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_df-f | |- ( G : B --> D <-> ( G Fn B /\ ran G C_ D ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_anbi12i | |- ( ( F : A --> C /\ G : B --> D ) <-> ( ( F Fn A /\ ran F C_ C ) /\ ( G Fn B /\ ran G C_ D ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_an4 | |- ( ( ( F Fn A /\ ran F C_ C ) /\ ( G Fn B /\ ran G C_ D ) ) <-> ( ( F Fn A /\ G Fn B ) /\ ( ran F C_ C /\ ran G C_ D ) ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_bitri | |- ( ( F : A --> C /\ G : B --> D ) <-> ( ( F Fn A /\ G Fn B ) /\ ( ran F C_ C /\ ran G C_ D ) ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_df-f | |- ( ( F u. G ) : ( A u. B ) --> ( C u. D ) <-> ( ( F u. G ) Fn ( A u. B ) /\ ran ( F u. G ) C_ ( C u. D ) ) ) |
| 14 | 7, 12, 13 | #P_3imtr4g | |- ( ( A i^i B ) = (/) -> ( ( F : A --> C /\ G : B --> D ) -> ( F u. G ) : ( A u. B ) --> ( C u. D ) ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_impcom | |- ( ( ( F : A --> C /\ G : B --> D ) /\ ( A i^i B ) = (/) ) -> ( F u. G ) : ( A u. B ) --> ( C u. D ) ) |
